sentences: Donzella Petty-John, known professionally as Nella Dodds (born January 25, 1950) is an American soul singer and actress.
Born in Havre de Grace, Maryland, United States, she recorded six released singles for Wand Records between 1964 and 1966.

She received additional training with Sylvia Harman of The Actor's Place in Virginia Beach, Virginia where she focused on The Meisner Technique as well as with Tom Logan, national and international director and acting coach, of Los Angeles, California.
